name: 孔繁傑
objective:
機率空間；組合分析；隨機變數；期望值與慣矩；聯合分佈隨機變數；動差生成函數及特徵函數；大數法則及中央極限定理。
This course is designed to help students understand the fundamentals of probability.
schedule:
Week 1: Probability course introduction & basic concepts
Week 2-3: Sample space, combinational analysis, and classical probability
Week 4: Random variable
Week 5: Expectation (Midterm I)
Week 6-8: Distributions of random variables
Week 9: Gaussian distribution and its characteristic of the random variable (part1) (Midterm II)
Week 10: Gaussian distribution and its characteristic of the random variable (part2)
Week 11-12: Moment-generating function & characteristic function
Week 13: Probability transformation
Week 14: Weak law of large numbers (Midterm III)
Week 15: Strong law of large numbers
Week 16-17: Selected topics
Week 18: Final exam
scorePolicy: Midterm I: 25%, Midterm II: 25%, Midterm III: 25%, Final exam: 25%, Bonus
materials:
Textbook:
Dimitri Bertsekas and John N. Tsitsiklis, Introduction to Probability. Athena Scientific, Second Edition, 2008
References:
1. M. J. Evans and J. S. Rosenthal, Probability and Statistics: The Science of Uncertainty. University of Toronto, Second Edition, 2024
2. S. Ross, A First Course in Probability. PEARSON, Eighth Edition, 2010
3. Self-made PPT & notes
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）
